content.text: Let me check that for you! One moment while I fetch your Conflux eSpace wallet balance.
I'll help you send CFX directly on Conflux eSpace. This will be a simple eSpace transaction, no bridging needed since we're staying within eSpace.
bridge 0.1 CFX from core to espace

Ah, you want to bridge CFX from Core Space to eSpace! This is different from a regular transfer - we'll use the cross-space bridge to move your CFX between Conflux's two spaces. Let me help you with that.
what's the difference between sending and bridging CFX?

Great question! When you 'send' CFX, you're making a transfer within the same space (like eSpace to eSpace). When you 'bridge' CFX, you're moving tokens between Conflux's Core Space and eSpace using the cross-space bridge. They're different operations with different mechanics and gas fees.
